note.p: Scottish-born Australian pastoralist and land owner. From Largo, Fife, Scotland. Emigrated to Australia as a free settler in 1823 with Andrew Brown, who became his manager. Successfully ran sheep on the Castlereagh River. Settled at Wallerawang (later called Barton Park) in 1824, where CD stayed with Andrew Brown, 18–19 January 1836.
New South Wales Office of Environment and Heritage (www.environment.nsw.gov.au/heritageapp/ViewHeritageItemDetails.aspx?ID=1960012, accessed 25 October 2019)
Parliament of New South Wales (www.parliament.nsw.gov.au/members/formermembers/Pages/former-member-details.aspx?pk=226, acessed 25 October 2019)
